Text.Page: You forced your way into the Banquet of Blood, sealed up the vampir leader's coffin, and tainted their food.

Rescuing villagers is important, but we need to do something that will completely disrupt the Banquet of Blood: Seal their leader's coffin, and taint their foul "food."

So, , are you up for another foray into the vampirs' midst?
Once again, <PCNAME>, you have done a great service, for which you will be long remembered.
